Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near State/18th
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses rerouted SB via State, Roosevelt, Michigan, Cermak & Archer; NB via Archer, Cermak, Michigan, Roosevelt & State due to blockage near State/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/18th.

  • Southbound buses will operate via State, Roosevelt, Michigan, Cermak and Archer.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Archer, Cermak, Michigan, Roosevelt and State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at State/18th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, via State, Cermak, Michigan, Roosevelt and State due to street blockage near State/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, via State, Cermak, Michigan, Roosevelt and State due to street blockage near State/18th.
